summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1109, for the improvement of Third Avenue, from Union Street to Yesler Way, certain other streets and certain parts of certain other streets, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, under Ordinance No. 12566 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
